item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Shontel Lewis is with Shenika Carter and 4 others.Let me show you how allies show up! Our Sisters put a call out to...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Shontel Lewis is with Shenika Carter and 4 others.

Let me show you how allies show up! Our Sisters put a call out to protect Black Women, specifically to protect one of the organizers of yesterday‚Äôs peaceful eve...nt, Shenika Carter.

I asked that we build our racial justice muscle and not remain silent when violent racial BS is occurring and endangering the life of a Black Woman. A life perpetually in danger.

The ask was to email the editor for this reckless, irresponsible, headline and attaching it to our Sister. Endangering her life.

This is how you use your power and your voice to Protect Black Women.

üñ§

item.title: ‚úäüèæ‚úäüèæ‚úäüèæ
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

‚úäüèæ‚úäüèæ‚úäüèæ

Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

A little over 4 hours after their bond was posted, our political prisoners have been released! All power to the people!

Now we continue the fight to #DropTheCh...argesCO

Comrades were there to salute and embrace Lillian, Joel and Eliza the moment they were released! We want to thank everyone who has stepped up in this last week to show support. Over the past seven days, thousands of people have signed the petition, participated in solidarity rallies across the country, added their name to the open letter of support, and made generous donations to their defense.

Authorities grossly violated their legal rights by refusing to bring the three activists up for a bail hearing. But they were finally forced to relent under major legal and political pressure, and now all three are out on bail.

Eliza, Joel and Lillian, along with Russell Ruch, still face outrageously false felony charges that could result in years-long imprisonment. And the cops who ruthlessly murdered Elijah McClain have not been brought to justice. We will continue the fight!

Now the next phase of this struggle begins ‚Äî to get all these unjust and bogus charges completely dropped ‚Äî and we will need all your solidarity, to continue to stand united as a movement.

Here is what you can do to help:

Sign on to the solidarity statement
Sign the petition to drop all the charges!
Donate to the legal and political support campaign for the arrested organizers

Please join us Saturday, Sept. 26 at Noon at the Colorado State Capitol to demand that all charges be dropped against the anti-racist organizers!


https://facebook.com/events/s/dropthechargesco-march-and-ral/775179416359489/?ti=icl

See More

item.title: Black people, take care of yourselves today. Take the day off if...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Black people, take care of yourselves today. Take the day off if you're able. #CallinBlack Love on yourselves and each other. Hold space for our grief. In addition to sustaining this movement, we are traumatized and navigating our survival. To effectively and equitably strategize for our freedom, we must lead with nurturing energy. To do this, we must take care of ourselves. Never give up! #Blackhealingisrevolutionary #Blackhealingovereverything #BlackLivesMatter #KeepGoing

No police officer will have to answer for Breonna Taylor‚Äôs death. This never gets easier.

nytimes.com

Opinion | It Hurts to Keep Hoping for Justice

No police officer will have to answer for Breonna Taylor‚Äôs death. This never gets easier.No police officer will have to answer for Breonna Taylor‚Äôs death. This never gets easier.

item.title: #DEMANDS...
item.content:encoded:
#DEMANDS
Immediately fire and revoke the pensions of the officers that murdered Breonna.
Divest from LMPD and Invest in community building
Immediate resignation (or impeachment) of Mayor Greg Fisher
Metro Council ends use of force by Louisville Metro Police Department.
Police shootings are gun violence.
A local, civilian community police accountability council that is independent from the Mayor’s Office and LMPD with investigation and discipline power #CPAC.
The creation of policy to ensure transparent investigation processes
#JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: #PSA: BLM5280 has nothing to do with this messaging from BLM...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#PSA: BLM5280 has nothing to do with this messaging from BLM Global Network Foundation. It reads just as out-of-tune with what's happening on the ground to us as it probably does to y'all. Our energy is focused on dismantling the oppressive system that murdered #BreonnaTaylor. Ain't nobody got time to be worrying about who is on the cover of Time. We are busy staying focused on supporting comrades in KY who have been on the ground for MONTHS and have told us exactly what they need. We encourage y‚Äôall to do the same by visiting the links in the comments provided by Black Lives Matter Louisville
#JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest

item.title: Three officers commit murder and only one is charged with wanton...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Three officers commit murder and only one is charged with wanton endangerment on a 15k bond. We have comrades still in jail right now for standing up and fighting back with higher bonds than that! No justice at all for #BreonnaTaylor. This is a failure. The system has failed her, her family, and the entire Black community at large. Pray, conjure, summon, manifest; call in whatever you believe in for protection, love, and power over Louisville. #JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest #ifwedontgetnojustice #theydontgetnopeace
https://apnews.com/28a283922de8784f6fca5c42fe8e5bca

LOUISVILLE, Ky. (AP) ‚Äî A Kentucky grand jury on Wednesday indicted a single former police officer for shooting into neighboring apartments but did not move forward with charges against any...

item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

https://www.facebook.com/PJUnidos1/videos/1446566685533466/

Padres & J√≥venes Unidos was live.

The company, Palantir Technologies, is ICE‚Äôs technology backbone, providing the digital infrastructure to surveil, detain and deport immigrants. Palantir‚Äôs tool...s have been used to conduct mass workplace raids, including the biggest raid in US history in which 680 people were detained in Mississippi. Palantir moved its headquarters to Colorado this month. Let's show them that they are not welcome in our city and state! We will not let Palantir profile our people and separate our families.

item.title: On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate....
item.content:encoded:
On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate.
We celebrate sex workers’ self-determination.
We celebrate sex workers’ enhanced visibility.
We celebrate the achievements of sex worker led organizations.
We celebrate and we keep the fight for decriminalization going until it is won.
#Sexworkiswork#decriminalizesexwork

item.title: #CallToAction...
item.content:encoded:
#CallToAction
HAPPENING NOW: Your mayor and council members are meeting to discuss the 2-year contract with #DenverPoliceDepartment that increases their budget in the second year. This budget increase allows for MORE funds devoted to the chemical weapons they terrorize our city with! They plan to quietly vote on it tomorrow 9/3 with only online public comment that they can control the narrative on with the click of a button. Contact your council member and Michael B. Hancock TODAY and let them know as their constituent you DEMAND they do not support the following:

‚ùåAny Collective Bargaining Agreement with DPD longer than 1 year.

‚ùåAny agreement that gives ANY financial increases or incentives to police.

‚ùåAny agreement that does not require police to be financially responsible for their attorneys and settlements in any cases of alleged excessive force or race related discrimination

#DEFUNDPOLICE #DEFENDBLACKLIFE
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280‚Äôs Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism.
